title: A must see
review: Clever, funny, touching, entertaining, surprises galore and even educational. In what universe could anyone not love this movie?

title: Watch this movie!!!
review: I loved this movie. I was so lucky to get to see this at Tallgrass Film Festival in Wichita, Kansas. This movie is wonderful. Funny, sweet, sad, endearing and a little bit crazy. Three disabled sorta friends going to a brothel to lose their virginity with none other than the incredible Gabourey Sidibe hired to be their driver. I cannot recommend enough.

title: Unexpectedly Fabulous
review: A buddy movie about 3 differently-abled young men who go on a road trip. It's hysterically funny, moving with great character development, and the actors are pitch perfect.
